Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE: In a central position directly opposite picturesque parkland, this impeccably presented property is nestled on a freshly landscaped block measuring some 590m2.
Ready to simply move into and enjoy or rent out with ease, the dark timber front fence further enhances the impressive street appeal complete with gorgeous colourful gardens that front the traditional brick facade and single garage.
Step inside and be greeted by matte finished timber flooring and plenty of natural light making the lounge/dining room with gas heating feel airy and spacious. Don't forget the separate meals area that adjoins the pristine kitchen with updated double wall oven.
There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master offering a walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite to match the equally as impressive family bathroom.
Added improvements include fresh paintwork, recently laid carpets, polished floorboards, updated blinds and down lights ... the list goes on!
If you love to live outdoors then 19 Latrobe Street is a certain addition to your shortlist. The backyard is a truly serene place to be with its vast decked pergola that looks out to the feature paved retreat and the lush tropical garden setting that makes you feel instantly at ease!
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed. Within moments to Narre Warren - Cranbourne Road, providing direct access to the shopping facilities situated at Thompsons Parkway, Casey Central and the Hunt Club Village, plus South Gippsland Highway enroute to the recently revamped Cranbourne Park shopping centre. Those that don't drive can take advantage of the public transport leading to local schools, the main street and, most importantly, the Cranbourne train station!
Opportunities like this are as rare as hens teeth so don't delay!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Please note:

As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.

Description:
650m2 of High Potential Land
INVESTORS, DEVELOPERS OR FIRST HOME BUYERS!!!!
First in, best addressed with this super three-bedroom home! With plenty to offer plus a popular location, this freshly updated property will appeal to a range of buyers with nothing to do but move in or rent out! This home has been freshly updated and the potential it brings will amaze you!
Features include:
- Potential to subdivide (S.T.C.A)
- Three tidy bedrooms, two with built in robes.
- Generous family living room and separate dining area
- Tidy kitchen featuring gas cooking and oven and plenty of cupboard space
- Family bathroom with bathtub and a separate toilet
- Central heating and A/C Split cooling
- Paved covered entertaining area outside; great to entertain friends and family
- Tidy blank canvas rear yard with and secure parking gated
- New tiles, paint and carpet throughout
- NBN access
All this is found on a perfect 650m2 block and you can forget about the car.. you won't need it! The home is easily within walking distance to so many amenities including parklands, bus stops, Duff Street Medical Centre, Cranbourne shopping centre, Cranbourne West Shopping Complex, Cranbourne West Primary School and St. Peter's College!
Take it all in but DON'T wait too long as this one won't last! Contact Simon Murphy to organize your private inspection!

Description:
Outstanding investment opportunity!
Shami Hamdam and LJ Hooker Cranbourne are proud to present this wonderful three bedroom, two bathroom and two car garage home to the market. This wonderful opportunity is situated on a massive 837 sqm (approx) of land which has potential for future development, ideal for a second dwelling STCA. The location on offer is simply superb, located in the heart of the much loved Cranbourne and in the catchment of Cranbourne Park Primary School and Cranbourne Secondary College. Furthermore, the house being in a walking distance to Cranbourne train station and Cranbourne Park shopping centre means this home is ideal for the investor or the first home buyer. Additionally, the home is currently tenanted on a month to month lease and the current tenants have been in the home for more than 5 years and are happy to stay long term, if an investor purchases the home.
- 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Master with a semi ensuite.
- 2 large separate living areas.
- Open plan kitchen/dining with lots of cupboard space.
- Outdoor pergola
Properties in this location and buy range donât come up often. Transport, schools and potential for future development, it doesnât get any better. With the market on the rise, this home will be snapped up QUICK! If you are a first home buyer, investor or downsizer, this home caters to all. Make sure you see it at the open home.
Contact Shami Hamdam today on 0469 709 277 from LJ Hooker.

All this plus many more extras are on offer here, so be quick to call and inspect!!!!

An Exciting Future Ahead!
An environment of immediate functionality along with a broad range of options to modernize, expand or possibly start a new project (STCA), this single-level Victorian home current floorplan comprises three bedrooms (all with BIRs), central bathroom, spacious living area and plenty of backyard space. Occupying a substantial block of land totaling 651m2 approx this home gives you plenty of options to renovate, redevelop or build a great investment portfolio.
Unbeatable location within moments too Cranbourne Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Drive Reserve, some of the best schools, local amenities and easy acsess to the Monash Freeway and South Gippsland Highway.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE: **JUST OVER 17 SQUARES IN LIVING SPACE ALONE** As you would expect of a property owned by the same caring family for the past 22 years, 9 Dunbar Avenue has been kept in pristine condition - an exciting proposition for the lucky new purchaser on the near horizon!
There is the opportunity to update and modernise, land bank for future development potential (S.T.C.A.) or simply move in and enjoy without having to break the bank.
Set on around 665m2 of land with a broad frontage, the home looks great front the street with its classic brick facade and surrounding gardens full of spring colour.
Step inside and feel instantly at ease and ready to enjoy features including the L-shaped formal lounge/dining room that is complemented by a separate family zone and a tiled meals area. The pristine hostess kitchen provides plenty of storage, whilst there are 3 generous bedrooms including the master with a virtually unmarked semi-ensuite that matches the presentation of the family bathroom, second toilet and full laundry.
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans take you through the seasons comfortably and as you step outside you will be greeted by a single carport set behind lockable gates. Don't forget the ducted vacuuming and the private backyard with an expansive entertainment area that overlooks a pond.
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed! Within moments of the shopping facilities situated at the recently revamped Cranbourne Park shopping centre you also have easy access to South Gippsland Highway. Those that don't drive can take full advantage of the public transport leading to the main street and, most importantly, the Cranbourne train station. You are also only a brisk walk from Cranbourne Park primary school and local parkland!
This is bound to walk out the door so don't delay!
Please note:

All of the property details noted were current at the time of publishing. Due to private buyer inspections, the status of the sale may change prior to pending Open Homes. As a result, we suggest you confirm the listing status before inspecting.

Description:
Access for all! With 19.91 (approx) meter frontage... park your trailer, truck or boat with side access and remote control lock up garage on large 669
This great sized 3 bedroom family home sits proudly on a large 669m2 block (approx). Featuring a large side accessed driveway that runs to the rear of the property allowing entry to the large remote controlled, lockable shed. Perfect for the tradesman who needs a bit of space.
Upon entry you are greeted by light and bright, formal living area, a great place to relax, watch a movie and unwind. A fully functioning, tiled kitchen with seated benches outlooks unto an open plan dining and second functional living space. This is the perfect family area, with floating floorboards, space for the kids to play and sliding door access to the spacious outdoor alfresco.
The outdoor space is ideally suited for entertaining and features a fully covered pergola bbq area. Another unique, standout feature is the large rear shed which incorporates a home office. Bedrooms are well sized, with built in robes and master with ensuite. Ducted heating and cooling throughout.
Centrally located.
Do not miss this opportunity.

Description:
Only 7 Years Old! Walk To The Shops From Your Modern Unit!
Conveniently located almost next door to doctors, Cranbourne Park shops, buses, train station & all the amenities Central Cranbourne has to offer, this great central gem must be seen to be appreciated.
Only 7 years young, you will be impressed with the lifestyle this property offers. Part of a neat group of only 3 units, this property proves to be perfect for down-sizers, investors or those entering the market. Boasting 2 spacious bedrooms, open plan living & dining, well equipped kitchen, family bathroom, and single lock up garage with internal access offering convenience & security.
A low maintenance block with a private courtyard for entertaining this summer complete the package. This is one not to miss as you can't get any more central than this! Take advantage of this rare opportunity today!

Description:
LIGHT, BRIGHT & PRIVATE
(1P3067) Located in a quiet 'court like street' is this great family home offering an abundance of light and character, and being only minutes' walk to the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, train station and local schools, making this home a great choice for downsizers, FHB's and investors.
Listed below are some of the properties features;
- 3 bedroom brick veneer home offering updated kitchen and bathroom.
- Master with walk-through ensuite & BIR.
- Floating timber floors.
- Single car garage, and block side access big enough for a small caravan, boat and or trailer.
- Decked pergola outdoor entertaining area.
- 436m² approx. block offering a backyard big enough for the kids to play, for gardening and or for the fur babies to run around.
Being situated in a very family friendly neighbourhood and with genuine sellers this one is sure not to last long. So, call today to arrange your private viewing.
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.

Description:
A Beauty With Park Frontage.
Proudly presenting this beautiful family home positioned right in front of an attractive tree lined park. Solidly built and offering a chance for one lucky buyer to grab a hold of something with attributes that are very hard to find. Ideal for those seeking a 3-bedroom home in good condition. Some of the features include:
- 3 bedrooms - master with 2 way bathroom and walk-in robe
- Entertainers kitchen fitted with quality stainless-steel appliances,40mm
stone benches with glass splashback.
- A large family/meals area.
- Nicely landscaped front & back garden with plenty of space.
- Remote controlled Double garage with internal access.
- Security alarm & cameras.
- Split air conditioning & ducted heating.
Conveniently situated in the best pocket of Cranbourne – literally 2 mins drive to hunt club shopping precinct, quality schools, parks, shops and public transport. To inspect and appreciate, call Vikram on 0430392918 or Ajay on 0403351577

Description:
Family Stunner!
Shami Hamdam and LJ Hooker Cranbourne are proud to present this beautiful family home to the market. Consisting of 4 ample sized bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a 2 car garage, this stunning family home is situated on a massive 611 sqm block of land and is waiting for a new family to move straight in. With a large double gated side access, you can easily park your trailer, caravan or any large vehicle here. Location here is superb, as you are only a few minutes away from Homemaker centre and Springhill shopping centre. Furthermore, the house is also located in the catchment of Cranbourne Carlisle Park Primary School and Cranbourne Secondary College.
- 4 ample sized bedrooms, all with walk in robes.
- 2 spacious separate living areas, perfect for entertaining and for the entire family to convene and dine.
- Ducted heating and Evaporative cooling throughout the entire house.
- Secure remote control double car garage.
- Beautiful big backyard perfect for the kids and pets.
Properties with these features and land size donât come up often. Transport, Schools and amenities only a few minutes away, it doesnât get any better. With the market on the rise, this home will be snapped up QUICK! Whether you are a first home buyer, investor or looking to upsize, this home caters to all. I look forward to seeing you at the home for home inspection.
Contact Shami Hamdam today on 0469 709 277 from LJ Hooker.

Description:
Attention First home buyers & Investors!
Nestled on a generous 640m2 (approx.) block in a near central location of Cranbourne, this property offers you a great opportunity to make it your first home or an important investment in your future. It's only a short walk from local shops, schools such as Cranbourne West Primary School & Cranbourne Park Primary School, St Agatha's Primary School and St. Peter's College and also 5 minutes' drive to Cranbourne station & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
Offering 4 bedrooms - master with adjoining en-suite and walk in robe - with the remaining three bedrooms with built in robes, the Cranbourne property offers both space and comfort for family living and not to forget an amazing outdoor covered area with a SPA.
Moving on to the Kitchen and dining area, the astute design of the home prevails in offering a large cooking area as well as an abundance of living area. The living area flows on to the substantial backyard which can be utilised for any family gatherings and entertainment.
Do not miss out on this rare opportunity to get your hands on this excellent location.
For more information and inquiries please call Vikram on 0430392918 or Ajay on 0403351577.
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
The best spot in town
Situated in the heart of Cranbourne, only moments away from the town centre, shops and restaurants, lies this young and charming, little unit, awaiting one lucky buyer to call it home.
This two bedroom unit will be well suited for a downsizer, first home buyer or an investor looking to grow their property portfolio.
Packed with many fantastic features, this unit comprises of:
- 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes
- 1 bathroom
- 1 single car garage with internal access
Other fantastic features include, functional kitchen with just the right amount of storage space, living and dining areas, heating and cooling, carpeted bedrooms and tiles to remaining areas.
Plus, relax and unwind underneath the covered outdoor area, perfect for summer nights and entertaining your guests!
Feel at ease knowing that you will be located in one of Cranbourne's most accessible and convenient locations.
This unit is well within walking distance to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, St Agatha's Primary School, Cranbourne Primary School, Cranbourne Turf Club & Racecourse, plus a large variety of restaurants and cuisines and easy access to South Gippsland Highway. Cranbourne Station is also only a 5 minute drive away.
With property prices on the rise, we urge all buyers to act fast and secure your future with this amazing opportunity in one of Cranbourne's prime locations!
Insights: 1/89 Sladen Street, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2019 and 23 other 2 bedroom unit in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
3 BEDROOMS - 2 BATHROOMS - WALK TO STATION!
If you're looking for a property that just "feels like home" from the minute you walk in, this is it!
PROPERTY SNAPSHOT:
* 3 bedrooms
* 2 bathrooms
* Light filled lounge with wood fire
* Split systems to both master bedroom & living area
* Security alarm
* Ensuite & WIR to master
* Single carport plus shed/garage
* Ample cupboard & bench space in kitchen
* Generous yard for children & pets to play
No matter whether you are starting out or looking for the ideal investment property - this well maintained and much loved home is sure to impress all who inspect.
Within walking distance to Hunt Club Village Shops, medical, dental, childcare, train station, bus and more you will absolutely kick yourself if you miss this one!

Description:
AUCTION THIS WEEKEND!
CRANBOURNE, Park Avenue Estate: Nestled in a quiet and friendly neighbourhood is this immaculately presented home which encompasses luxury and classall under one roof! It is set on a sprawling 576 sqm approx. block and is conveniently located close to all the facilities and amenities, making it the perfect family home.
This captivating house comprises 4 very good sized bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The Master is sure to impress with ample space, a full ensuite with spa and modern design WIR! The other bedrooms are equally spacious all with built in robes.
Step into the world of grace and warmth this lovely home has to offerthere are 3 separate living areas (The Formal Lounge, The Family Living, Rumpus/ Theatre Room, along with a separate dining space).The entertainer in you would be thrilled at the sight of the fantastic outdoor living area. The kitchen opens up into a grand alfresco and fully enclosed pergola , with classy merbau decking and merbau bench seat and superior quality pull down block out blinds.
Main Features of the Property:
- 4 Bedrooms Plus Study
- Master With Ensuite (Spa) & WIR
- 3 Living Areas (Formal Lounge, Family Living, Rumpus/ Theatre Room)
- Ultra Modern Kitchen, Large Bench Top, Stainless Steel Appliances
- Large BIP
- Custom Built Modern Design Laundry
- New Carpet
- Premium Window Coverings
- Double Car Garage (Lockable, Internal Access)
- Grand Alfresco with block out blinds, merbau decking and merbau bench seat
- Beautifully Landscaped Front & Back Gardens

- Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes (Evaporative & Split System)
- Down Lights: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days.
The property is ideally located, very close to all the basic amenities:
Casey Grammar School
Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School
Carlisle Park Vikings Cricket club
Medical Centre
Springhill Shopping Centre
Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Home maker centre
Casey central Shopping centre
Hunt Club Shopping centre
Cranbourne Library
Casey RACE
Merinda Park Train station
Cranbourne Train station
This house ticks all the boxes and is truly a hidden gem in the heart of Cranbourne! Call Hardeep Singh now and book a tour!
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.
